Class I18nSpringAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.displaytag.localization.I18nSpringAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
I18nResourceProvider, LocaleResolver
public class I18nSpringAdapter extends Object implements LocaleResolver, I18nResourceProvider
Spring implementation of a resource provider and locale resolver. Since Displaytag locale resolution is modelled on the Spring one, it simply forward resolveLocale calls to the Spring-configured LocaleResolver.
